amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to post notice of rescission of funds and the amount of funds rescinded on the public website of the Department of Health and Human Services.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 112-70 to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to post notice of rescission of funds and the amount rescinded on the public website of the Department of Health and Human Services.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 239 (Roll no. 281).

action.text: Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 239 (Roll no. 281).
